    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AboutDialog
    Modal "About" dialog for the application.
    AddTaskCommand
    Command: add a task.
    App
    Application entry point (UI mode).
    AppTheme
    Central theme tokens (colors, sizes).
    ByStateCount
    Aggregated counts per TaskState for reporting (Visitor result).
    ByStateCsvExporter
    CSV exporter for ByStateCount.
    ByStatePlainTextExporter
    Plain text exporter for ByStateCount.
    Command
    A reversible application action (Command pattern).
    CommandException
    Wraps low-level exceptions (DAO/validation) thrown while executing or undoing a command, so the ViewModel can expose a single checked exception upward to the UI.
    CommandStack
    Undo/Redo stack for application commands.
    CompletedTaskRec
    Record representing a task in "Completed" state for export visitors.
    ConfirmExitDialog
    ConfirmExitDialog Modal dialog asking the user to confirm exiting the application.
    ContentArea
    ContentArea ----------- Three-column container: LEFT | CENTER | RIGHT.
    ControlPanel
    ControlPanel Three rounded square buttons (Add, Edit, Delete), each size=AppTheme.CTRL_BLOCK_SIZE, centered in the middle of each vertical third of the panel.
    CountByStateVisitor
    Visitor that counts tasks by state and returns a ByStateCount report.
    CsvFlatTaskVisitor
    Produces CSV text (UTF-8) for tasks by visiting ExportNode variants.
    DAOProvider
    Central provider for the application's Data Access Object (DAO).
    DeleteTaskCommand
    Command: delete a task.
    DerbyBootstrap
    DerbyBootstrap -------------- Loads Derby embedded driver, boots/creates the DB, and ensures schema.
    DerbyConfig
    DerbyConfig ----------- Central place for Derby URL construction and constants.
    EmbeddedDerbyTasksDAO
    EmbeddedDerbyTasksDAO
    ITasksDAO implementation over embedded Apache Derby.
    ExportDialog
    ExportDialog ------------ Modal dialog that lets the user configure task export: - Choose file destination - Select export format (CSV / TXT) - Optionally export only filtered tasks Returns the chosen options to the caller.
    ExportDialog.ExportResult
    Container for user’s export configuration.
    ExportFormat
    File export formats supported by the application.
    ExportNode
    Export node variants (records) used for pattern-matching in export visitors.
    Filters
    Ready-made task filters (Combinator building blocks).
    HeaderBar
    HeaderBar Left: title label (~60%) Right: pill buttons (About / Close) (~40%) Uses AppTheme tokens for colors/sizing and UiUtils.styleHeaderPillButton(...) for the rounded header buttons.
    InProgressTaskRec
    Record representing a task in "InProgress" state for export visitors.
    IReportExporter<T>
    Adapter interface to export a Report into a textual representation.
    ITask
    Represents a task in the system.
    ITaskFilter
    Functional filter over tasks (Combinator pattern).
    ITasksDAO
    Data Access Object (DAO) for tasks persistence.
    ITaskVisitor
    Base visitor over task export record variants.
    MainFrame
    MainFrame Borderless frame with HeaderBar (About/Close) and the main ContentArea.
    MarkStateCommand
    Command: change a task's lifecycle state.
    MarkStateCommand.TaskFactory
    Factory for creating a new immutable snapshot with a different state.
    ObservableList<T>
    Very small observable list wrapper for UI binding.
    ObservableList.Listener<T>
    Listener notified when the list reference or contents change as a whole.
    PlainTextFlatTaskVisitor
    Produces plain-text block list for tasks by visiting ExportNode variants.
    Property<T>
    Minimal observable property (Observer pattern).
    Property.Listener<T>
    Listener of value changes.
    Report
    Marker interface for all reports generated by TaskVisitors.
    RoundedPanel
    A simple JPanel with rounded corners and a custom background color.
    SortByState
    Sorts tasks by lifecycle state (ToDo < InProgress < Completed), then by title (case-insensitive), then by id to stabilize order.
    SortByTitle
    Sorts tasks by title (case-insensitive), then by id to stabilize order.
    SortStrategy
    Strategy for sorting task lists.
    Task
    Immutable-identity Task entity (id) with validated fields and a behavioral state (State pattern via TaskState enum).
    TaskEditorDialog
    TaskEditorDialog ---------------- Modal dialog for creating or editing a task.
    TaskEditorDialog.EditorResult
    Result of user confirmation.
    TaskEditorDialog.Mode
    Mode of the editor (Add or Edit).
    TaskEditorDialog.Prefill
    Initial values for edit mode.
    TasksDAOException
    Project-specific exception for persistence/DAO errors.
    TasksPanel
    TasksPanel ------------------------------ Sticky header + scrollable list.
    TaskState
    Task lifecycle states implemented as a behavioral enum (State pattern).
    TasksViewAPI
    View-side API for Tasks MVVM.
    TasksViewModel
    ViewModel (MVVM) for the Tasks screen.
    TasksViewModel.RowDTO
    Immutable UI row DTO (decouples UI from domain types).
    TaskVisitor
    Visitor interface required by the project (see Requirements.md).
    TestAPI
     
    ToDoTaskRec
    Record representing a task in "ToDo" state for export visitors.
    ToolBox
    ToolBox Vertically split into 3 equal sections: Top third: "Search for a task" (centered) + centered text field.
    UiUtils
    UiUtils ------- Swing utilities for styling widgets in a consistent, theme-aware way.
    UiUtils.RoundedMatteShadowBorder
    Rounded matte border with a soft bottom shadow (no external libs).
    UpdateTaskCommand
    Command: update an existing task.
    ValidationException
    Thrown when a domain object (e.g., Task) violates validation rules.
    ViewModelException
    Generic exception type for ViewModel-facing operations.
    WindowChrome
    WindowChrome Utilities for borderless windows with rounded corners and drag handling.
